ComicInfo.Summary:
After a devastating blow against her family, Masumi sets out to eliminate the rest of the Yakuza... but she is unaware that Ryujin, the dragon god, is already hunting her, creating a complicated web of traps to lead her into a one on one confrontation with him. Even with the Blades of Sin, will Masumi be able to beat a man who can control the demons within?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Harvey Tolibao & Ivan Nunes | 1 | B | Cover B | Paolo Pantalena & Ula Mos | 2 | C | Cover C | Jason Cardy | 3 |
